description:
He stepped on the soles of his feet, scorned and mocked, because he was a high-ranking rich young master, and he was just a bodyguard he hired with money, and just a humble man. After four years of tossing and turning, and meeting again, he became an obscure, poor laborer, and the man he had looked down upon was already at the pinnacle of power! 

'Master, do you know how long I have been looking for you? Haha, four years!'

'You, let go! !'>
